title: Lowest prevalence of anemia among women
description: In 2019, only 7.4% of women of reproductive age in Guatemala were affected by anemia, which is one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Lowest prevalence of anemia among non-pregnant women
description: In 2019, the prevalence of anemia among non-pregnant women in Guatemala was just 7%, marking it as one of the lowest in the world.

title: High child employment in manufacturing for females
description: In 2015, 22.94% of economically active female children aged 7-14 in Guatemala were employed in manufacturing, one of the highest rates globally.
